statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT feedback, rating, attendee_id FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT id, feedback FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE attendee_id = 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE attendee_id = 50 AND concert_id = 10;
SELECT id, rating FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT attendee_id, concert_id, rating FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(id) AS total_responses FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE concert_id = 100
SELECT feedback, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM feedback_survey_responses GROUP BY feedback HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT attendee_id, concert_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM feedback_survey_responses GROUP BY attendee_id, concert_id HAVING total_rating > 20
SELECT * FROM feedback_responses;
SELECT id, attendee_id, feedback FROM feedback_responses WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_responses WHERE concert_id = 100 ORDER BY survey_question ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT concert_id FROM feedback_responses WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE attendee_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_responses WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT id, feedback FROM feedback_responses WHERE attendee_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_responses WHERE concert_id = 3 AND attendee_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback_responses WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' OR feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT DISTINCT concert_id FROM survey_responses ORDER BY concert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Concert_Attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, concert_name, feedback_score FROM Concert_Attendees ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT concert_name FROM Concert_Attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback_score FROM Concert_Attendees WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, total_attendees FROM Concert_Details WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Concert_Attendees WHERE feedback_score > 4
SELECT attendee_name, concert_name, feedback_score FROM Concert_Attendees
SELECT * FROM Survey_Responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, venue_name FROM Concert_Details WHERE total_attendees > 100
SELECT attendee_name, concert_name, response_text FROM Concert_Attendees JOIN Survey_Responses ON Concert_Attendees.attendee_id = Survey_Responses.attendee_id
SELECT * FROM concert_attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, rating FROM concert_attendees WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name FROM concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, feedback FROM concert_attendees ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice' ORDER BY question_id;
SELECT * FROM concert_attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback FROM concert_attendees WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, date FROM concerts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback, rating, concert_name FROM concert_attendees JOIN concerts ON concert_attendees.id = concerts.concert_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM concert_attendees;
SELECT * FROM concert_attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback FROM concert_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM concerts ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT feedback_type, rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM concert_attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback FROM concert_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, venue_name FROM concerts WHERE concert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_type, rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_type ASC
